dct_description_sm: field investigation, aerial photographic interpretation and compilation by D.M. Carroll ; drawn, photographed and prepared for color printing by the Directorate of Overseas Surveys.
"This map is one of the three which accompany the report on the Land Resources of Lesotho by M.G. Bawden and D.M. Carroll."
"Base map derived from D.O.S. 621, Lesotho, 1:250,000, 1st ed."
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain, Directorate of Overseas Surveys.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
